description:
Want to grow your money, but aren't sure how to do it? Heard about the stock market but aren't sure how to get started?

This course takes you through the essentials keys about investing and the stock market so that you know what kind of investment strategy is right for you. You will learn about the different kinds of stocks, how to research and evaluate a stock to see if it's right for you, and build a winning portfolio.

If you're a beginner with the stock market this crash course will give you the information you need to get acquainted and get going in your investment journey.
title: Take Control By Learning The Stock Market Now
